## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< HEAD
<<<<<<< HEAD
var isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
=======
const isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
>>>>>>> cbaeadb69664be713d49558df22b6f02c48f3384
=======
const isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
=======
var isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
>>>>>>> 6be43a322 (figuring out lint)
>>>>>>> 84b8e337c (figuring out lint)

isPathCwd(process.cwd());
//=> true

isPathCwd('unicorn');
//=> false
```
